name: Double Jump!
description:
Looking for great, simple platformer game? We've got you covered:

  • 3 button gameplay
  • Parkour across 48 levels in 4 different themed worlds!
  • An ever increasing diversity of enemies, traps and mechanics!
  • Unlock unique characters along the way!
  • Adjust the difficulty for a fun game experience no matter your skills or patience!

Get your keyboard's arrow keys ready and start jumping!
